title: Permabanned wrongly for 1 game ? (chat log included)
body:
Disclaimer: I got 14 days of ban something like 3 months ago, I played a lot less 'cause I wanted to be less toxic (even tho I've never used insults or such, It's not part of me).

The following is the ONLY chat log I received for my permaban.

Game 1
In-Game
NekoMahou: ? (one of the enemy team wrote my nickname)
NekoMahou: u are?
NekoMahou: janna, that vayne knows how to play 
NekoMahou: ok
NekoMahou: just play passive bot
NekoMahou: hf mid
NekoMahou: janna
NekoMahou: what did u do (Janna randomly R'd)
NekoMahou: janna?? (no answer) 
NekoMahou: don't talk janna (Caitlyn made a mistake and she started blaming her)
NekoMahou: not ui
NekoMahou: :)
NekoMahou: have fun with ur report then (Janna said she was going afk)
NekoMahou: u will when u'll get banned (she answered she didn't care)
NekoMahou: you just blamed caitlyn when you're not in a position to speak (she kept blaming Caitlyn, so I tried to make understand she shouldn't do that expecially when not in a position to)
NekoMahou: u should shut up
NekoMahou: and learn to play in the first place (one of the two"flaming" phrases that costed me permaban?)
NekoMahou: then u speak
NekoMahou: understood?
NekoMahou: hey nasus
NekoMahou: so
NekoMahou: what do we do about this vayne (Nasus said early game that Vayne wasn't going to be a problem, she was fed and I couldn't find a tactis to beat her)
NekoMahou: ?
NekoMahou: guess why he got fed again
NekoMahou: it's not
NekoMahou: once gets fed when he's good ("arguing" with Nasus that a fed player is a good player)
NekoMahou: i'm asking nasus now
NekoMahou: prince of i know what's going to happen (he noobshamed me in the beginning when I told Janna that Vayne knows how to play, saying that I didn't know what I said because she picked fleet foot)
NekoMahou: tell me nasus what do we do
NekoMahou: go nasus show me
NekoMahou: cause he would die (Morgana asked Caitlyn why didn't she stop the recall, in the voice chat Caitlyn told me that she was scared to die because Vayne was fed) 
NekoMahou: smarter than lots of u (here's the second phrase that could be considered "flame"?)
NekoMahou: Please report Janna for afk and flaming (blaming and afk)
NekoMahou: thank u
NekoMahou: it's ok morgana
NekoMahou: enemy bot is bad
NekoMahou: you said
NekoMahou: we win (Morgana wanted to FF so I tried to encourage her)
NekoMahou: shut uop 
NekoMahou: shut up (she kept going)
NekoMahou: :)
NekoMahou: my eyes,. (they kept blaming)
NekoMahou: no words
NekoMahou: nasus got it (Morgana wanted to FF again)
NekoMahou: right nasus?
NekoMahou: what'!?!? (Nasus saying he couldn't carry the game)
NekoMahou: uc ant'!?!
NekoMahou: oh god really!?!?
NekoMahou: so
NekoMahou: u are saying that the vayne i warned u about
NekoMahou: u and morgana
NekoMahou: IS A PROBLEM!??!
NekoMahou: OH MY GOD
NekoMahou: I'M SHOCKED (Funny way Raul Paul queen style of saying "guys, I told you this was going to happen")
NekoMahou: u got it
NekoMahou: oh really
NekoMahou: ?!??1'1
NekoMahou: morgana u'r reported aswell (Morgana kept blaming)
NekoMahou: by two of us
NekoMahou: learn to be a decent human being
NekoMahou: and then u speak
NekoMahou: in fact morgana
NekoMahou: i'm 7/8 (Morgana writing "Jungle diff" saying that I was shit)
NekoMahou: and he's 1/4
NekoMahou: say it again, jungle dff
NekoMahou: score talks, and you're overshaming yourself everytime you try to accuse me
NekoMahou: so, please report morgana for flaming and janna for afk and flaming, please
NekoMahou: thank u
NekoMahou: bye morgana, have fun while you can, you lost your argument (refering at the blame, I couldn't take that I should take the blame for a game I played decently)
NekoMahou: and u nasus, next time, listen to what people says to u (refering to early game about Vayne's going to be a problem)
Post-Game
NekoMahou: thank you to those who will report morgana
NekoMahou: and janna
NekoMahou: and Nasus you should learn to listen to people (talking about what I said early game and that I should've been listened)
NekoMahou: cause i was right
NekoMahou: and you've learned a lesson today
NekoMahou: hopefully this will take you somwhere
NekoMahou: if we didn't have morgana that vayne would've been a problem anyway (Morgana should've put a Black Shield on Nasus and he was flaming her)
NekoMahou: and you couldn't kill her
NekoMahou: i was right, period (he kept blaming other people instead of understanding that the Vayne was a real issue like I said)
NekoMahou: learnn from it
NekoMahou: you're welcome bro (implying that this will probably be avoided next time that someone like me says to be careful about someone's else skill)
NekoMahou: :)

Now, addressing that I've talked with Riot after the 14 days ban, and that they know I am trying to be reformed ('Cause I once flamed a LOT worse,  but never insulted people) do I really deserved a PERMABAN for this one game after a long time? 

I kindly ask you to be reasonable, and not to attack me only because Riot said that I should've been banned. I already sent a support ticket for false accusation. A permaban is really too much even addressing the few two "flaming" phrases that I wrote.  If they can be considered flaming.

Thank you very much in advance.

replies.body: This would most likely contribute to a chat restriction, and since you had a recemt 14 day ban; it would be escalated to a perma.  Keep in mind not playing for 3 months isn't going to drop your punishment tiers. Playing a week later and playing 3 months later would be the exact same in game time.

I played at least a month where I started my reformation, writing stuff in a kindly way (even if i am not that kind of a person in real life, this was hard to me, but I tried), then two months of no-gaming or a single game a week or something where I didn't wrote anything for the last two months. This is the only game chat log that I've received, how can I be PERMABANNED for this? I can't even have a bad day now? And even If, this got me permabanned? This?

Lets assume that first month you played 1 game a day and it was a 31 day month. That is 31 games. Then maybe 1 game a week for 2 months, 8 more games. So as far as thr system is concerned, it had been 39 games since your last punishment. Which is no where near enough to show reformation as far as we have been able to establish.

So you're saying 39 games of no-flaming and improved quality time doesn't show anything, one bad game with so-hardly-considered "flame" of one bad game and I'm off? Here goes my good intentions in reformation rewarded like that? I don't understand, doesn't seem fair or right to me.

Let's have you answer the reverse question instead. 

In those 39 games, how many of them did you exhibit similar behavior? 

While these chatlogs are mild in severity,  it's still classified as flame through passive aggressiveness.

Since the system punishes based on consistency x severity,  if you had a few games of similar behavior,  then it is enough for the system to ding you for it. Especially when you've recently come off a 14-day ban, your account is on thin ice  and the system is hypersensitive towards your behavior.

I don't know how many times do I have to repeat that this is the ONLY chat log that I've received, I really feel fatigue when you write these stuff like you're trying to convince yourself. I posted EVIDENCE that's all I have, I didn't have any other chat log, If what you said is right I would've received others but the sole fact that what I said Is right (about my reformation) Is a prove that I took things seriously and I didn't even use this called by you "passive aggressive" behaviour. I had one bad game in tons. ONE, with hardly-considerable flame phrases.

The reform card only shows you 1-5 recent games as examples of unacceptable behavior,  doesn't mean you were punished for 1 game alone. 

I challenge you to write to https://support.riotgames.com and ask them how any games were considered in your punishment. Their answer will suprise you.
Already did, I'm waiting for an answer.

You were already in a bad punishment tier.  In the future, just mute these players and ask your team do to so as well.  Do NOT threaten reports or ask others to report.  This is toxic.  "He started it" is not a proper defense.

Enemy team was purposively getting fed on the Janna intentionally feeding, I owed them an explaination and I of course asked for help. What did I have to say? Please keep going getting fed purposively on the intentional feeder?

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-03T23:57:16.412+0000)
>
> Enemy team was purposively getting fed on the Janna intentionally feeding, I owed them an explaination and I of course asked for help. What did I have to say? Please keep going getting fed purposively on the intentional feeder?

You report the player and move on with your life.
So basically you're saying that someone asks you (the victim) what's going on and because you are scared to hurt the butcher's feeling you say "nothing" instead of asking for help? Ah.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:14:28.490+0000)
>
> So basically you're saying that someone asks you what's going on and because you are scared to hurt the butcher's feeling you say "nothing" instead of asking for help? Ah.

Actually, if your response is going to be toxic, you just don't respond.  If your reponse is genuinely productive, go with it.  If they are flaming, mute them. 

Regardless of how you spin it, your behavior was incorrect, and instances like what your chat records show are instances that healthy players want to avoid.

My response was literally "Please report Janna for afk and flaming", so that's basically productive because i've given information to a team who was abusing farming purposively on the Janna intentional feeding, which they answered me "will report her" so you are literally the only one complaining about this in this situation. I would consider more toxic not to answer to what's going on instead. I'm not spinning anything, I'm talking about facts here, I didn't hide any content, It's all on the paper up above. 
If you consider me a flamer because I've asked enemy team to report a reportable player, or because I've said to another "learn to play", then I really hope from the deep of my heart that you'll never find a real flamer. Expecially if you consider that, even If I'm getting reformed (and I have proof of my past game) I deserve a punishment harsh like this.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:24:02.201+0000)
>
> My response was literally "Please report Janna for afk and flaming", so that's basically productive because i've given information to a team who was abusing farming purposively on the Janna intentional feeding, which they answered me "will report her" so you are literally the only one complaining about this in this situation. I would consider more toxic not to answer to what's going on instead. I'm not spinning anything, I'm talking about facts here, I didn't hide any content, It's all on the paper up above. 
> If you consider me a flamer because I've asked enemy team to report a reportable player, or because I've said to another "learn to play", then I really hope from the deep of my heart that you'll never find a real flamer.

Riot only considers one report on each player per game.  If 9 people report one player in the game, the bot only looks at 1.  Asking people to report, therefore, perpetuates the trolling unnecessarily.  You're feeding the troll.  Not only that, you perpetuated the toxic environment. Plus, you did flame.  Just because you "barely" flamed doesn't mean you didn't. You were sanctioned.

You are in the wrong here bud, and everyone is saying so.

Let's condemn someone who stole a candy to jail forever when he was starving to death. (An hardly-considerable-phrase of flaming adding a bad day). If this is the world you're living in, then you and eveyrone who think this is right, certainly are. I really hope you understand how absurd you sound. I find It kinda scary that people even think this is right.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=00030000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:32:48.666+0000)
>
> Let's condemn someone who stole a candy to jail forever when he was starving to death. (An hardly-considerable-phrase of flaming adding a bad day). If this is the world you're living in, then you and eveyrone who think this is right, certainly are. I really hope you understand how absurd you sound. I find It kinda scary that people even think this is right.

Buddy.  You displayed toxic behavior, with a history of displaying toxic behavior, after being sanctioned for toxic behavior, with an understanding of the risks of displaying toxic behavior.  

Someone else's bad play or toxicity does not justify your own.

You are not looking at the facts. Riot herself said to me before I started my reforming "We are all human, we all have bad day when we play bad, we all make mistakes" this is my LITTLE mistake in my reforming journey after almost 50 games of improvements. You can say whatever you want to make It right, It'll never be, facts are talking. Black on white.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=0003000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:47:02.237+0000)
>
> You are not looking at the facts. Riot herself said to me before I started my reforming "We are all human, we all have bad day when we play bad, we all make mistakes" this is my LITTLE mistake in my reforming journey after almost 50 games of improvements. You can say whatever you want to make It right, It'll never be, facts are talking. Black on white.

Why then, are you the only person that thinks so, and why then, is the entire community, and Riot, telling you that you are wrong?

I didn't really expect to find support here, to be honest, If you're here on this forum you're full of Riot, thinking that they are never wrong, the sole fact that some people completely avoided the question "Is it right this kind of punishment" or even saying "This COULD be considered flaming for a 14 days chat restricted" It's literally a win to my statement.

I'll quote you a guy that just commented this post; "I can't express how glad I am that you got banned for threatening to report someone. Go fuck yourself and enjoy it pussy"

This is the kind of person that you should be scared of, not me, we're not the same, we don't deserve equal threatments, and just to complete my statement, Riot would probably consider flaming this conversation too, between the two of us.

Peace out :)
Are you really saying that is fair and normal to get permanetly banned for ONE game of hardly-considered flame after starting the reformation (that already showed several results in the past)?
When you recently got off a 14-day ban, you're basically on thin ice.

I would understand If I would hardly flame and basically just got recently banned, but the most disturbing thing I could've said Is "learn to play". And In those three months I played a little in a kind way, showing results, this can't be happening, It's worse of getting blamed for a game you didn't lose.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:13:37.107+0000)
>
> I would understand If I would hardly flame and basically just got recently banned, but the most disturbing thing I could've said Is "learn to play". And In those three months I played a little in a kind way, showing results, this can't be happening, It's worse of getting blamed for a game you didn't lose.

you were telling them you were going to report them, asking for reports, telling someone to shut up. aka this is considered a form of harassment. You had a 14 day ban that takes a few months of consistent playing to deteriorate i believe. next time take your advice and "shut up" and just report them in post game. 1 report=10 reports and 1 report without telling them is just as good as telling them you're going to except you dont piss them off more and you don't like an a-class jerkwad

Why do I find this even more disturbing? Not warning a teammate that is going to get reported (and basically will probably get sanctioned without even knowing why). From my point of view, from Riot's point of view, reporting a teammate and giving It punishments should educate in a more enjoyable player, then why If I warn them that if they keep with their behaviour there will be consequences is considered flaming?

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:39:30.832+0000)
>
> Why do I find this even more disturbing? Not warning a teammate that is going to get reported (and basically will probably get sanctioned without even knowing why). From my point of view, from Riot's point of view, reporting a teammate and giving It punishments should educate in a more enjoyable player, then why If I warn them that if they keep with their behaviour there will be consequences is considered flaming?

people don't like being insulted or threatened (with reports) when they might feel they're just having a bad game/day. people don't like being confronted, period. better to stay quiet. and riot will tell them what they did if they get punished. they'll be told it was for inting or toxic, just like they told you. they signed the agreement so hypothetically they know they can get punished for whatever it is that you'll be reporting them for

What you were doing is not warning them, but threatening their account to get punished. 

If you wished to warn people, actually warn them and not threaten them. You can say *"Janna, such actions can get you punished. Please don't do that."*, and that will be a fair warning without any intent of threatening their accounts to be punished.

Still not answering my questions. I really don't see a difference between what you said to me and what I told them. That Janna would've answered me "I don't care" and kept going just like she did anyway. I told her that for her action I was going to report her. You can't just permaban someone for one slip and because that person was trying to do the right thing. This is crazy.

> I got 14 days of ban something like 3 months ago, I played a lot less 'cause I wanted to be less toxic

Dropping a punishment tier takes a while, and is measured in games played, as opposed to time passed.

In regards to your chat log, you were quite negative and abusive towards your team members, especially **Morgana ** and Janna, whom you spent the majority of your game irritating with report threats. While this isn't something that would trigger a permanent suspension out of the blue (but rather a chat restriction after repeating this kind of behaviour), it was negative enough to warrant one after your 14-day account suspension. Even the slightest amount of toxicity can get you permanently suspended during that period, which is what happened in your case.

14-day suspension is a warning that you're on thin ice. At that point, Riot doesn't expect your behavior to be slightly better, they expect it to be _good_. And you spent the entire match flaming and harassing your teammates. That's far from good. You weren't permabanned wrongly, and you weren't permabanned for "1 game," but rather for one _more_ game of terrible behavior that proved to Riot that you will never shape up.

Your refusal to believe that your behavior was inappropriate or that your ban was justified is _exactly why you are permabanned_.

Sorry but no, It's just this game after several games of improvements, and this is the only log chat that I've received. You don't want to believe It but It's the hard truth and you're talking of things that I didn't do just proves my point further that I didn't deserve to be permabanned for just this game. Because that's about It, just this game in two months and a half where I played good and I did better. Let's not even consider the fact that this "negative behaviour" It's merely subjective, because that's what It Is. I've made read this log chat to lots of people and a good 75% said that Riot overeacted and I won't get disban because they treat costumers as robots and not human being. They will never address that they, themselves, got a slip. 
And, for the record, just to prove this point once more; I got this "behaviour" in every. other. single. games. (and also real life) and LoL Is the only one who has done anything to me this far, in other games I didn't even receive an email arguing about my "manners".
This Is what I get to try to respect the code of this community, I got threated FOR ONE GAME like other flamers who wishes deaths to others and family.

My behaviour in some aspects may be considered inappropriate, even If I just used JUSTICE as my weapon (reports) and I payed for It.

And those are facts.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2019-02-04T23:22:22.175+0000)
>
> Sorry but no, It's just this game after several games of improvements, and this is the only log chat that I've received. You don't want to believe It but It's the hard truth and you're talking of things that I didn't do just proves my point further that I didn't deserve to be permabanned for just this game. Because that's about It, just this game in two months and a half where I played good and I did better. Let's not even consider the fact that this "negative behaviour" It's merely subjective, because that's what It Is. I've made read this log chat to lots of people and a good 75% said that Riot overeacted and I won't get disban because they treat costumers as robots and not human being. They will never address that they, themselves, got a slip. 
> And, for the record, just to prove this point once more; I got this "behaviour" in every. other. single. games. (and also real life) and LoL Is the only one who has done anything to me this far, in other games I didn't even receive an email arguing about my "manners".
> This Is what I get to try to respect the code of this community, I got threated FOR ONE GAME like other flamers who wishes deaths to others and family.
> 
> My behaviour in some aspects may be considered inappropriate, even If I just used JUSTICE as my weapon (reports) and I payed for It.
> 
> And those are facts.

What things you didn't do? The only things I said you did were flame and harass your teammates, and you definitely did. You repeatedly told them to shut up, you repeatedly shrieked about reporting them and getting them banned (delicious irony), you told them to learn to play, and more.

And once again, you weren't permabanned for "just this game." You were permabanned because you misbehaved repeatedly, were told to improve your behavior repeatedly, and yet here you are again spending a match raging at your team and harassing people (yes, calling for reports is harassment, on top of being useless). Not only is a couple months a pretty short time period to go between instances of behavior this poor, you didn't even play much, so that just shows that when you do play your behavior is often bad.

Your behavior was negative according to Riot's policies, which you agreed to multiple times when you created an account, installed the game, and acknowledged your punishments. This is Riot's game, so they make the rules, and you broke those rules.

For the nth time (though not the last, I'm sure), you weren't banned because of one game. You frequently break the rules, and Riot decided to put a stop to it.

And, also again, your refusal to accept the fact that your behavior was considered inappropriate according to the rules you agreed to and therefore your ban is justified is the entire reason that your account has been permanently banned. Riot realizes that you'd keep doing this if they keep letting you play, so they're not letting you play anymore.

I repeately told them to shut up because THEY WERE FLAMING and this is considered flame too? Do you even realise how INSANE you sound? I told them to learn to play before talking, yes, I did, because I wanted them to understand that If they have to flame at least they had to have a good reason for, when they were the first to do terrible in games. I couldn't take that they were making my friend Caitlyn take the fault for something he didn't do, so YES I told them to shut up, because we couldn't take to listen to their flame. Hopefully you'll understand what you are saying because It's literally "You got permabanned because you told them to shut up and learn to play" hell yes? I would do It again, asking people who are flaming to SHUT UP, you can bet. 
This is the only chat log that I've received and a couple of month of GOOD games can't take a stand against a ONE game after starting reformation. After PLENTY of games when I endured and not flamed because I had to settle with Riot's rules. I calculated with the other guy from here and I've had AT LEAST 40 games before this one that got me off. 
When you talked about Riot's policies I literally dropped my arms. Only because Riot says It doesn't mean that Is right. But I can understand how someone who just told me that I got permabanned because I said to a flamer to shut up can't understand what I am saying. 
If I frequentely broke the rules even in this time I want proof, It's since I created this post (almost 2 days) that I created the support ticket without an answering, and you are literally speculating on my permaban without information, because the only information I'm giving you and I have are written up above. And as far as we both know, expecially me which Is the one person who knows how hard have tried not to flame in the last almost three months, this Is the only reason I got permabanned: which Is ABUSRD.
I'm a decent human being, I know how justice works, I know when things are wrong. Should I have received the 14 days bans and so on to understand things? Absolutely yes. I was toxic even when I fought for the greater good. Should I receive a permaban because I told the enemy team "Shut up and learn to play", literally "SHUT UP" because I was done with their flame? Do I really have to answer? If you make me I'm literally freaked out from this community.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-05T02:33:46.914+0000)
>
> I repeately told them to shut up because THEY WERE FLAMING and this is considered flame too? Do you even realise how INSANE you sound? I told them to learn to play before talking, yes, I did, because I wanted them to understand that If they have to flame at least they had to have a good reason for, when they were the first to do terrible in games. I couldn't take that they were making my friend Caitlyn take the fault for something he didn't do, so YES I told them to shut up, because we couldn't take to listen to their flame. Hopefully you'll understand what you are saying because It's literally "You got permabanned because you told them to shut up and learn to play" hell yes? I would do It again, asking people who are flaming to SHUT UP, you can bet. 
> This is the only chat log that I've received and a couple of month of GOOD games can't take a stand against a ONE game after starting reformation. After PLENTY of games when I endured and not flamed because I had to settle with Riot's rules. I calculated with the other guy from here and I've had AT LEAST 40 games before this one that got me off. 
> When you talked about Riot's policies I literally dropped my arms. Only because Riot says It doesn't mean that Is right. But I can understand how someone who just told me that I got permabanned because I said to a flamer to shut up can't understand what I am saying. 
> If I frequentely broke the rules even in this time I want proof, It's since I created this post (almost 2 days) that I created the support ticket without an answering, and you are literally speculating on my permaban without information, because the only information I'm giving you and I have are written up above. And as far as we both know, expecially me which Is the one person who knows how hard have tried not to flame in the last almost three months, this Is the only reason I got permabanned: which Is ABUSRD.
> I'm a decent human being, I know how justice works, I know when things are wrong. Should I have received the 14 days bans and so on to understand things? Absolutely yes. I was toxic even when I fought for the greater good. Should I receive a permaban because I told the enemy team "Shut up and learn to play", literally "SHUT UP" because I was done with their flame? Do I really have to answer? If you make me I'm literally freaked out from this community.

This kind of behavior is why you were permabanned.

I'm sorry I didn't undertstand that we do not live in a democracy and I couldn't explain where you are wrong because else would mean that I have a negative behaviour and I'll get permabanned. 
Please keep going saying that I deserved the ban, you're on the right track.

> [{quoted}](name=NekoMahou,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xr1as5hT,comment-id=000900000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-05T16:23:13.273+0000)
>
> I'm sorry I didn't undertstand that we do not live in a democracy and I couldn't explain where you are wrong because else would mean that I have a negative behaviour and I'll get permabanned. 
> Please keep going saying that I deserved the ban, you're on the right track.

Riot games is a private entity, not a democracy. Flaming your teammates like you did is like going to someone's house party and shouting at everyone repeatedly. The owner told you three times to stop it, but you kept going, so now you're no longer allowed in.

Basically saying "Yea, Riot doesn't care If you don't agree with their policy, It's their game and they do what they want even If It's literally considerable wrong.". The owner also told me that I had to improve, something that I did before taking this ONLY game that they made me pay too harsh.
